Verses: 1 dhevan Novaavaiyum, Avanudane Pezhaiyilirundha Sagala Kaattumirugangalaiyum, Sagala Naattumirugangalaiyum Ninaiththarulinaar; Dhevan Boomiyinmel Kaatrai Veesappanninaar, Appozhudhu Jalam Amarndhadhu.
2 aazhaththin Ootrukkangalum, Vaanaththin Madhagugalum Adaipattana; Vaanaththu Mazhaiyum Nindru Poyitru.
3 jalam Boomiyilirundhu Naalukkunaal Vatrikkonde Vandhadhu, Nootraimbadhu Naalukkup Pinbu Jalam Vadindhadhu.
4 ezhaammaadham Padhinezhaam Thedhiyile Pezhai Araraadh Ennum Malaigalinmel Thangitru.
5 paththaam Maadham Mattum Jalam Vadindhukonde Vandhadhu; Paththaam Maadham Mudhal Thedhiyile Malaichchigarangal Kaanappattana.
6 naarpadhu Naal Sendrapin, Novaa Thaan Pezhaiyil Seydhirundha Jannalaith Thirandhu,
7 oru Kaagaththai Veliye Vittaan; Adhu Purappattu Boomiyinmel Irundha Jalam Vatrippogumvaraikkum Pogiradhum Varugiradhumaai Irundhadhu.
8 pinbu Boomiyinmel Jalam Kuraindhu Poyitro Endru Ariyumpadi, Oru Puraavaith Thannidaththilirundhu Veliye Vittaan.

9 boomiyinmeedhengum Jalam Irundhapadiyaal, Andhap Puraa Than Ullangaal Vaiththu Ilaippaara Idam Kaanaamal, Thirumbip Pezhaiyile Avanidaththil Vandhadhu; Avan Than Kaiyai Neetti Adhaip Pidiththuth Thannidamaagap Pezhaikkul Serththukkondaan.
10 pinnum Ezhu Naal Poruththu, Marupadiyum Puraavaip Pezhaiyilirundhu Veliye Vittaan.

11 andhap Puraa Saayangaalaththil Avanidaththil Vandhu Serndhadhu; Idho, Adhu Koththikkonduvandha Oru Olivamaraththin Ilai Adhin Vaayil Irundhadhu; Adhinaale Novaa Boomiyinmel Jalam Kuraindhu Poyitru Endru Arindhaan.
12 pinnum Ezhu Naal Poruththu, Avan Puraavai Veliye Vittaan; Adhu Avanidaththirkuth Thirumba Varavillai.

13 avanukku Arunootroru Vayadhaagum Varushaththil, Mudhal Maadham Mudhal Thedhiyile Boomiyinmel Irundha Jalam Vatrippoyitru; Novaa Pezhaiyin Melthattai Eduththuppaarththaan; Boomiyinmel Jalam Illaadhirundhadhu.
14 irandaam Maadham Irubaththezhaam Thedhiyile Boomi Kaaindhirundhadhu.
15 appozhudhu Dhevan Novaavai Nokki:
16 neeyum, Unnodekooda Un Manaiviyum, Un Kumaararum, Un Kumaararin Manaivigalum Pezhaiyai Vittup Purappadungal.

17 unnidaththil Irukkira Sagalavidha Maamsajandhukkalaagiya Paravaigalaiyum, Mirugangalaiyum, Boomiyinmel Oorugira Sagala Praanigalaiyum Unnode Veliye Varavidu; Avaigal Boomiyile Thiralaai Varththiththu, Boomiyinmel Palugip Perugakkadavadhu Endraar.
18 appozhudhu Novaavum, Avan Kumaararum, Avan Manaiviyum, Avan Kumaararin Manaivigalum Purappattu Vandhaargal.
19 boomiyinmel Nadamaadugira Sagala Mirugangalum, Oorugira Sagala Praanigalum, Sagala Paravaigalum Jaadhijaadhiyaaip Pezhaiyilirundhu Purappattu Vandhana.

20 appozhudhu Novaa Karththarukku Oru Balipeedam Katti, Suththamaana Sagala Mirugangalilum, Suththamaana Sagala Paravaigalilum Silavatraith Therindhukondu, Avaigalaip Balipeedaththinmel Thaganabaligalaagap Baliyittaan.

21 sugandha Vaasanaiyaik Karththar Mugarndhaar. Appozhudhu Karththar: Ini Naan Manushan Nimiththam Boomiyai Sabippadhillai; Manushanudaiya Irudhayaththin Ninaivugal Avan Siruvayadhuthodangip Pollaadhadhaayirukkiradhu; Naan Ippozhudhu Seydhadhupola, Ini Sagala Jeevangalaiyum Sangarippadhillai.
22 boomiyulla Naalalavum Vidhaippum Aruppum, Seedhalamum Ushnamum, Kodaikaalamum Maarikaalamum, Pagalum Iravum Ozhivadhillai Endru Thammudaiya Ullaththil Sonnaar.
